definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: whirl, dance, writhe (NH, Aram. id., dance; Ar. h.a0la change, turn; As. ḫîlu, writhe in fear Dl:Pr 191 (on ḫ = h. v. DHM:ZK i. 357); on form of Heb.

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pf. 3 fs. [[חָ֫לָה]] Mic 1:12 + 2 t.; [[וְחָלָה֫]] consec. Ho 11:6; [[חַלְתִּי]] Is 23:4; [[חָ֫לוּ]] Je 5:3 (but v. infr.), La 4:6; [[וְחָלוּ֫]] De 2:25; [[חַ֫לְנוּ]] Is 26:18; Impf. [[יׇחוּל]] Je 23:19 Je 30:23; 3 fs. [[תָּחוּל]] Ez Eze 30:16 Qr (Kt Co [[תחיל]]); [[וַתָּחָׂל]] Je 51:29; [[אחולה]] Je 4:19 Kt (Qr [[אוֹחִילָה]], Hiph. [[יחל]]); [[יׇחֻ֫לוּ]] 2Sa 3:29; but also [[יׇחִיל]] Ps 55:5 (Job 20:21 v. II. [[חול]]); [[וַיׇּ֫חֶל]] 1Sa 31:3 = 1Ch 10:3 + Ge 8:10 (where rd. prob. [[וַיִּיׇּ֫חֶל]] as v:Ge 8:12; = [[וַיְיַחֵל]] Ol Di); 3 fs. [[תָּחִיל]] Is 26:17 + 2 t. + Ez Eze 30:16 Kt (cf. supr.); [[וַתָָּחֶל]] Ps 97:4; 2 fs. [[תְּחִלִין]] Is 45:10; [[וׇחִילוּ]] Ps 77:17+ 3 t. (Ps 10:5 v. II. [[חול]]); [[וַיׇּחִ֫ילוּ]] Ju Jdg 3:25; [[יְחִילוּן]] Is 13:8; [[תָּחִ֫ילוּ]] Je 5:22; Imv. fs. [[חוּ֫לִי]] Mic 4:10, Ps 114:7; mpl. [[חִילוּ]] Ps 96:9, 1Ch 16:30; Inf. cstr. [[חוּל]]([[לָ]]) Ju Jdg 21:21, Ez Eze 30:16 ( = Inf. abs.); Pt. fs. [[חוֹלָה]] Je 4:31 vid. Gf Gie and Ges:§ 72 R. 1; —
dance Ju Jdg 21:21 ([[לָחוּל בַּמְּחׂלוֹת]]).
twist, writhe:

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: fig., be in severe pain, or anguish (mostly poet. and elevated prose), sq. [[מפני]] De 2:25 (‖[[רגז]], cf. also [[פַּחַד]] and [[יִרְאָה]] v:a); Ez Eze 30:16, Ps 96:9, Je 5:22 (‖[[ירא]]); sq. [[מִלִּפְנֵי]] 1Ch 16:30, Ps 114:7; abs. Ps 55:5 (‖[[אימות מָוֶת נפלו עלי]]), Je 4:19 Kt, Ps 77:17 (‖[[רגז]]) Ps 97:4, Is 13:8, Is 23:5, Je 51:29 (‖[[רָעַשׁ]]), Joe 2:6, Zec 9:5 (‖[[ירא]]), prob. also 1Sa 31:3 (cf. 1Sa 28:5) = 1Ch 10:3, cf. Öt; fig. of mts. Hb Hab 3:10.

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: in contrition Je 5:3, [[חָ֫לוּ]] der. fr. [[חול]] Ew Gf Gie ; < SyrVer Ra Hi Ke al. fr. [[חלה]] (wrongly accented; vid. [[חלה]]

definitions.title: d.
definitions.body: in anxious longing [[עַד בּוֹשׁ]] Ju Jdg 3:25, sq. [[לְ]] Mic 1:12 (on Ge 8:10, cf. supr.)

whirl, whirl about [[עַל־ראׁשׁ יוֹאָב]] (i.e. blood—[[דמים]]—of Abner, from sword) 2Sa 3:29; of attack of sword itself Ho 11:6 (‖[[כִּלָּה]], [[אכל]]), cf. La 4:6 [[לא חָ֫לוּ בה ידים]]; of tempest [[על ראשׁ רשׁעים יחול]] Je 23:19 (v:a [[סער]] [[מִתְחוֹלֵל]]) = Je 30:23 (v:a [[סַעַר מִתְגּוֹרֵר]]).
dance Ju Jdg 21:23, so perh. also 1Sa 18:6 (rd. [[הַמְּחׂלְלוֹת]] LXX We Dr; and [[חׂלֲלִים]] pt. ([[מ]] om.) Ps 87:7 RV Pe De Che Bae; cf.

writhe in travail with, bear, bring forth (poet.), of Sarah, mother of Isr., Is 51:2 (‖[[אַבְרָהָם אֲבִיכֶם]]); of hinds Job 39:1 Ps 29:9 (caus.); fig. of ´[[י]]'s producing earth Ps 90:2 (‖[[יֻלָּדָוּ]]); of his bringing forth Isr. (with difficulty, v. Di) De 32:18 of north wind bringing forth rain Pr 25:23; [[רַב מְחוֹלֵל כִָּל]] Pr 26:10 a master produceth everything (on trans. see VB; Ew. al. derive fr. [[חלל]] wound).
wait anxiously (cf.

definitions.title: Qal 2 d
definitions.body: ), sq. [[לְ]] Job 35:14 (Elihu).
be made to writhe Job 26:5 ([[הָֽרְפָאִים]]).
be brought forth Job 15:7 (‖[[תִּוׇּלֵד]]), Ps 51:7 (‖[[יחם]]), metaph. of wisdom Pr 8:24, Pr 8:25.

definitions.title: Hiph.
definitions.body: Impf. [[יׇחִיל]] Ps 29:8, Ps 29:8 cause to be an anguish, c. acc. [[מִדְבָּר]], subj. ´[[י]].

definitions.title: Hoph.
definitions.body: Impf. [[יוּחַל]] Is 66:8 be born (= travailed with, Che), subj. [[אֶרֶץ]] (‖[[יִוׇּלֵד גוי]]).

definitions.title: Hithpol. 1.
definitions.body: Pt. [[מִתְחוֹלֵל]] whirling ´[[סַעַר מתח]] Je 23:19 ( = [[סער מִתְגּוֹרֵר]] Je 30:23).
writhing, suffering torture Job 15:20 (of life of wicked).
Imv. [[הִתְחוֹלֵל]] Ps 37:7 wait longingly sq. [[לְ]] for, ‖[[דּוֹם]].

definitions.title: Hithpalp.
definitions.body: Impf. 3 fs. [[וַתִּתְחַלְחַל]] Es 4:4 and she writhed in anxiety.
